/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking upwards towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Cars are parked neatly on the side of the road, hinting at the hustle and bustle of city life. In the distance, a bridge stretches across the scene, connecting two parts of the city. The sky above is a clear blue, with the sun shining brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene.
